faq.question: What types of regulations does it support?
faq.answer: All types: federal regulations (CFR), state laws, industry standards (ISO, FDA), international regulations (GDPR, MiFID), and more.

faq.question: Can it track regulation changes?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload both old and new versions to get a summary of what changed and new compliance requirements.

faq.question: Does it identify compliance deadlines?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The AI extracts effective dates, implementation deadlines, and reporting periods.

faq.question: Can I get alerts for new regulations?
faq.answer: Team and Enterprise plans include monitoring features for regulatory updates in your industry.

faq.question: Is it secure for sensitive compliance data?
faq.answer: Yes! Enterprise-grade security, SOC 2 compliance, and we never train on your data.
